title: Titivisiwile - Tempele ya Orbital
heading: Tivisiwe Loko Yi Pfuka
description:
Hi November 28, 2025, Tempele ya Orbital yi ta tlhandluka.
Siya e-mail ya wena, hi ta ku byela loko yi fika exibakabakeni.

form.successMessage: Hi ta ku fikelela loko yi tlhandluka.
form.errorMessage: Ku ni leswi nga famba kahle. Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe.

backLink: ‚Üê Ku tlhelela eka ku hlayela endzhaku
